text: i'm frank in today's topic is mere to the zero dashwood exam and its preparation first of all i'd like to discuss about the two verdict on the exam related skills and technologies and then afterwards i'd like to share my personal experiences how you can reduce your chances of failure in the timariotes zero dasso one the exam which is related to temere certified professional six data center vitalization delta spinach c and credits toward vere certified professional certification so let's get started this exam validate the ability to determine how permissions are applied and inherited in the center server identify the correct permissions needed to integrate the center server with other were products and explain the behaviour of a given an i o c setting it also deals with the ability to create storage policies appropriate for given work loads and availability requirements differentiate available storage load balancing options and configures storage policies

as you are now aware about the course outline related technologies and required skilled for this exam we now move on to examination preparation discussion this advice is also best suited for busy professionals who have minimal time to prepare for their certification exam

two types of candidates mostly attempt the exam one who are completely dinners and the other who are mostly professionals who have enough theoretical knowledge and want to get a certification to validate their credentials

the beginners there is no alternate to study guides or tutorial recommended on official vendor sits if those resources are little price here in detail you should prefer them always they are recommended for a reason and you can also search around the internet or join online study groups to find relevance study materials for free or at a discount

but no matter what type of candidate you are past the actual certification exam do not forget the practice test questions i don't know how to stress this more if you have to do only one thing to prepare for the actual exam then it must be using the practice exams please practice exams are built with the actual examiners in mind and they will let you validate your knowledge quickly just sir provides practice exams that are created by subject matter specialists these practice exams have multiple learning and practice modes and after you attempt to practice test session the software keeps record of your progress and shows you your weak areas you can retake the practice test as many times as you like until you will feel confident about the actual exam you can even custome your testing mode to make it more difficult as your confidence grows this will help you pass your actual exam in an amazing way you will feel almost zero pressure during the exam and the actual questions will look familiar to you you can try a free dem these practice exams to understand how it will work in short these practice test will make you familiar with the style and form of the actual exam questions and allow you to take a short mock exam to see how well you have understood and retained the learning from the preparation material that you used so visit just siroco and down load a free dame of the product i have also placed some helpful links in the description of this video so make sure to check these out to
